alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwestern Brooks Range; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 2:27PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Major Winter Storm This Weekend... A strong surface low pressure is expected to develop in the Bering Sea on Saturday, posing another significant winter storm threat across the North Slope and Brooks Range beginning Sunday and lasting into early next week. Heavy snow, significant blowing and drifting snow, and strong winds are expected during this time period, particularly from Utqiagvik west. Snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches are possible at this point, with easterly winds gusting to 50 mph along the northwest Arctic Coast. Residents should take proper precautions to ensure safety in preparation for any holiday travel over the weekend. Stay tuned to www.weather.gov/fairbanks as we continue to monitor changes to the outlook throughout the weekend.
